kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/user/getUserInfo path_url=/user/getUserInfo headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
